title: Low
review: Very obvious influence from artists like Kraftwerk. Its a very ambitious project by David and i absolutely love it.

title: Mona Lisa Overdrive
review: One of their best albums. Filled with an assortment of different sounds and masterful production. Imai creates an amazing atmosphere with the electronic sounds. Some tracks, like 'Girl', sound very pop while others, such as 'Zangai', are very metal-esque
hightlights: Zangai, Girl, Mona Lisa, Sid Vicious on The Beach
